abstract: Lenders need to write down the amounts owed by homeowners, but the different stakeholders have been unable to agree on how to do this, though they share common interests.
snippet: Lenders need to write down the amounts owed by homeowners, but the different stakeholders have been unable to agree on how to do this, though they share common interests.
lead_paragraph: IMAGINE that you are watching an outdoor theater production while sitting on the grass. You have difficulty seeing, so you prop yourself up on your knees. Soon everyone behind you does the same. Eventually, most people are kneeling or standing, yet they are less comfortable than they were before and have no better view. Everyone should sit down, and everyone knows it, but no one does.

headline.main: Reviving Real Estate Requires Collective Action
